person.persName: William B. Wadlington (Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer and 1st lieut 48th Ky Inf USA)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky, native. Married to Sarah E. Wadlington. Father of James L. Wadlington, John M Wadlington, Davis B. Wadlington, Mildred M. Wadlington, Isabella Wadlington, Helen B. Wadlington, and William H. M. Wadlington. Farmer in Lyon County, Kentucky, in 1860. Served in 48th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as first lieutenant from October 26, 1863, to December 18, 1864.
